name: Cyclopi
description:
A tamagochi-like.

Controls (in-game):
- Left click to rest if awake, or wake up if resting
- Right click to spawn 
- Hover over a young to feed them

The 'things' have a set behaviour, and it's best to find out the game mechanics yourself, but you can read about them here if you want.

There is no actual goal to this game.
